about_the_game:
Are you in this Mansion all... not alone?

Welcome to an abandoned mansion full of ghosts and monsters! You play as the boy Nick, who is stuck in a huge mansion in the middle of the forest. Help him to unravel the secrets of this place, find a way out and not to die.

The Nick is a horror-RPG adventure in which you will have to explore a huge multi-story mansion filled with secrets and dangers. Along the way you will meet many characters. Make new (strange) friends and dodge deadly attacks from non-friends!



Features

  • Unique battle system. You have no weapons! Because of this, you'll have to pay attention to your surroundings and solve puzzles right during the carnage. Or you can try to just run away...
  • Interesting plot. Read old letters, communicate with the lodgers and open closed doors with a fascinating story.
  • An old building full of secrets. This place is not so clean. We have prepared a huge number of secrets for you to find along the way!
  • A diverse world. Not limited to one design of the old house, a variety of different settings are waiting for you. The world of The Nick is a lot of fun to explore!
  • Novel narrative. This game breaks its own game principles and presents horrifying details of the story. What you don't sacrifice for the story!
  • We gave this game a serious criticism score of 10 out of 10.
  • State of the art graphics, user interface and experience. You will get a new experience from a 16-bit game that combines modern designs: realistic lighting, atypical interface and serious technical parameters such as frame rate and optimization that are on par.
  • Original design and soundtrack. We hand-drew this world, and our composers will help you understand more the atmosphere of this creepy and melancholic adventure.
  • 1 chapter free! Get a taste of the immersive game thanks to free access! Try the immersion in the rest of the chapters too... not for free.
  • There are no dogs in the game (probably)... But... you can go to the ghost bar!...
  • Don't expect to be able to install the game on your grandmother's PC with Windows XP and 0.5 RAM just because of the pixelated graphics!
.

It's getting darker...

Don't submit to the cute pixel wrapper! This game may not be at all what it claims to be. Well, I mean, we don't know anything, but... be vigilant.

name: The Nick

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It's recommended to configure graphics settings in the game settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Additional Notes: For the best gaming experience, it's recommended to use ULTRA graphics configuration in the game settings

short_description: A horrific adventure where you play as Nick, who needs to find a way out of an abandoned mansion. Will you be able to unravel all the secrets this place holds and still stay alive...?
